channel.title: How do i put a source and client together?
channel.description:
How do i a delta source with a different delta client?
Here's the code i get when it happens. P.S I'm kinda of a noob :|
server.ini doesn't exist! Error loading settings java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\server.ini (The system cannot find the file spe cified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.Server.main(Server.java:118)
npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. [ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\world\map_index (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at server.util.clipping.region.Region.load(Region.java:310) at server.util.clipping.region.Region2.load(Region2.java:6) at server.Server.main(Server.java:169)
I'm using the Euthymia source and (what ever client)

item.title: How do i put a source and client together?
item.dc:creator: @Enji Enji
item.description:
@Enji wrote:

How do i a delta source with a different delta client?

Here’s the code i get when it happens.
P.S I’m kinda of a noob

server.ini doesn’t exist!
Error loading settings
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\server.ini (The system cannot find the file spe
cified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at server.Server.main(Server.java:118)

npc.cfg: file not found.
npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
autospawn.cfg: file not found.
item.cfg: file not found.
globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
doors.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.
[ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\data\world\map_index (The system cannot find th
e path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at server.util.clipping.region.Region.load(Region.java:310)
at server.util.clipping.region.Region2.load(Region2.java:6)
at server.Server.main(Server.java:169)

I’m using the Euthymia source and (what ever client)
